name: Aztec Blood
description:
AZTEC BLOOD IS AN AMAZING CLICKER GAME REALIZED FOR THE LUDUM DARE 43  : 
 "SACRIFICE MUST BE DONE". 


THE PURPOSE IS SIMPLE ! 
YOU HAVE TO SACRIFICE THE BIGGER NUMBER OF PEOPLE BEFORE THE UPCOMING ECLIPSE ! 
BY FILLING THE BLOOD'S JAR YOU WILL SURVIVE A LITTLE MORE !

TRY TO GET AS FAR AS YOU CAN AND UNLOCK NEW WEAPONS, UPGRADES AND CHARACTERS !
